statements: DELETE FROM labeled_training_data WHERE label = 'spam' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_name = 'Neural Network';
DELETE FROM labeled_training_data WHERE id = 1 AND label = 'spam';
DELETE FROM machine_learning_models WHERE model_type = 'classification' AND model_name LIKE '%spam%';
DELETE FROM model_training_history WHERE model_id = 10 AND accuracy < 0.7;
DELETE FROM training_data WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01' AND label = 'spam';
